channel.title: github_trending
channel.description: Latest posts from https://github.com/trending. follow.is: None

item.title: ruanyf /weekly
item.description: 科技爱好者周刊，每周五发布

item.title: assafelovic /gpt-researcher
item.description: LLM based autonomous agent that conducts deep local and web research on any topic and generates a long report with citations.

item.title: metabase /metabase
item.description: The easy-to-use open source Business Intelligence and Embedded Analytics tool that lets everyone work with data 📊

item.title: songquanpeng /one-api
item.description: LLM API 管理 & 分发系统，支持 OpenAI、Azure、Anthropic Claude、Google Gemini、DeepSeek、字节豆包、ChatGLM、文心一言、讯飞星火、通义千问、360 智脑、腾讯混元等主流模型，统一 API 适配，可用于 key 管理与二次分发。单可执行文件，提供 Docker 镜像，一键部署，开箱即用。LLM API management & key redistribution system, unifying multiple providers under a single API. Single binary, Docker-ready, with an English UI.

item.title: langgenius /dify
item.description: Dify is an open-source LLM app development platform. Dify's intuitive interface combines AI workflow, RAG pipeline, agent capabilities, model management, observability features and more, letting you quickly go from prototype to production.

item.title: zhayujie /chatgpt-on-wechat
item.description: 基于大模型搭建的聊天机器人，同时支持 微信公众号、企业微信应用、飞书、钉钉 等接入，可选择GPT3.5/GPT-4o/GPT-o1/ DeepSeek/Claude/文心一言/讯飞星火/通义千问/ Gemini/GLM-4/Claude/Kimi/LinkAI，能处理文本、语音和图片，访问操作系统和互联网，支持基于自有知识库进行定制企业智能客服。

item.title: krahets /hello-algo
item.description: 《Hello 算法》：动画图解、一键运行的数据结构与算法教程。支持 Python, Java, C++, C, C#, JS, Go, Swift, Rust, Ruby, Kotlin, TS, Dart 代码。简体版和繁体版同步更新，English version ongoing

item.title: lobehub /lobe-chat
item.description: 🤯 Lobe Chat - an open-source, modern-design AI chat framework. Supports Multi AI Providers( OpenAI / Claude 3 / Gemini / Ollama / Qwen / DeepSeek), Knowledge Base (file upload / knowledge management / RAG ), Multi-Modals (Vision/TTS/Plugins/Artifacts). One-click FREE deployment of your private ChatGPT/ Claude application.

item.title: Mintplex-Labs /anything-llm
item.description: The all-in-one Desktop & Docker AI application with built-in RAG, AI agents, and more.

item.title: ocrmypdf /OCRmyPDF
item.description: OCRmyPDF adds an OCR text layer to scanned PDF files, allowing them to be searched

item.title: lucide-icons /lucide
item.description: Beautiful & consistent icon toolkit made by the community. Open-source project and a fork of Feather Icons.
